statements.statement: SELECT MSG_ID , MSG_TXT_KR , MSG_TXT_EN , MSG_TXT_LO , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), MODIFY_DATE, 121) AS MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_USER_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM MES_MESSAGE_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MSG_ID LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #MSG_ID# = '' THEN MSG_ID ELSE #MSG_ID# END) + '%' AND ( MSG_TXT_KR LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #MSG_NM# = '' THEN MSG_TXT_KR ELSE #MSG_NM# END) + '%' OR MSG_TXT_EN LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #MSG_NM# = '' THEN MSG_TXT_EN ELSE #MSG_NM# END) + '%' OR MSG_TXT_LO LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #MSG_NM# = '' THEN MSG_TXT_LO ELSE #MSG_NM# END) + '%' ) ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
SELECT MSG_ID , MSG_TXT_KR , MSG_TXT_EN , MSG_TXT_LO FROM MES_MESSAGE_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MSG_ID = #MSG_ID#
SELECT COUNT(MSG_ID) AS VAL_CHK FROM MES_MESSAGE_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MSG_ID = #MSG_ID#

MERGE INTO MES_MESSAGE_MA AS A USING (SELECT #MSG_ID#) AS B (MSG_ID) ON (A.MSG_ID = B.MSG_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.MSG_TXT_KR = #MSG_TXT_KR# , A.MSG_TXT_EN = #MSG_TXT_EN# , A.MSG_TXT_LO = #MSG_TXT_LO# , A.MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() , A.MODIFY_USER_ID = #REG_ID# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( MSG_ID, MSG_TXT_KR, MSG_TXT_EN, MSG_TXT_LO, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #MSG_ID#, #MSG_TXT_KR#, #MSG_TXT_EN#, #MSG_TXT_LO#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID# );
